description: Mechanical dissociation of human spleen tissue to single cells for use in 10X chromium scRNA-Seq preparation.
status_info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

components.data: Receive spleen punch in solution.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Receive spleen punch in solution.

components.data: Place spleen punch onto 100mm Glass Petri Dish.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place spleen punch onto 100mm Glass Petri Dish.

components.data: Add 10ml Cold PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 10ml Cold PBS.

components.data: Slice spleen punch into small pieces (approximately 10x10x10mm).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Slice spleen punch into small pieces (approximately 10x10x10mm).

components.data: Transfer spleen pieces and PBS into 50ml Falcon Tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer spleen pieces and PBS into 50ml Falcon Tube.

components.data: Add 100µl DNAse I dropwise to spleen punch in PBS to a final concentration of 100µg/ml.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 100µl DNAse I dropwise to spleen punch in PBS to a final concentration of 100µg/ml.

components.data: Incubate at room temperature for 5 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at room temperature for 5 min.

components.data: Mash spleen through 100µM cell strainer above a 50ml Falcon Tube using a 2.0ml syringe plunger, washing through with 10ml Cold PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mash spleen through 100µM cell strainer above a 50ml Falcon Tube using a 2.0ml syringe plunger, washing through with 10ml Cold PBS.

components.data: Transfer to 15ml Falcon Tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer to 15ml Falcon Tube.

components.data: Centrifuge at 500g for 5 min at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 500g for 5 min at 4°C.

components.data: Add 1ml Red Cell Lysis buffer to the pellet and resuspend by racking/tapping.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1ml Red Cell Lysis buffer to the pellet and resuspend by racking/tapping.

components.data: Place on ice 5 min with periodic agitation.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place on ice 5 min with periodic agitation.

components.data: Add 9ml Cold PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 9ml Cold PBS.

components.data: Centrifuge at 500g for 5 min at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 500g for 5 min at 4°C.

components.data: Resuspend pellet in 5ml Cold PBS with 0.04% BSA (8µl BSA/ml PBS).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend pellet in 5ml Cold PBS with 0.04% BSA (8µl BSA/ml PBS).

components.data: Filter through a 100µM cell strainer above a 50ml Falcon Tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter through a 100µM cell strainer above a 50ml Falcon Tube.

components.data: Wash cell strainer through with 5 ml Cold PBS with 0.04% BSA (8µl BSA/ml PBS).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash cell strainer through with 5 ml Cold PBS with 0.04% BSA (8µl BSA/ml PBS).

components.data: Count cells using trypan blue and a C-Chip or the nucleocounter.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Count cells using trypan blue and a C-Chip or the nucleocounter.

components.data: If percentage of live cells is higher than 70-80%, cells can then be processed for scRNA-seq.a. If percentage of live cells is below 70-80%, remove dead cells by following “MACS Live Dead Separation”.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: If percentage of live cells is higher than 70-80%, cells can then be processed for scRNA-seq.a. If percentage of live cells is below 70-80%, remove dead cells by following “MACS Live Dead Separation”.

source_data.status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data:
A single-cell suspension should have been prepared previously and cells number and viability assessed using 1:1 trypan blue dilution.

  • A viability percentage below 70-80% usually justifies using this Dead Cell Removal protocol.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
A single-cell suspension should have been prepared previously and cells number and viability assessed using 1:1 trypan blue dilution.

  • A viability percentage below 70-80% usually justifies using this Dead Cell Removal protocol.

components.data:
Remove required number of cells and place in a 15ml Falcon Tube.

  • Required number of cells/total cells = volume required (ml).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Remove required number of cells and place in a 15ml Falcon Tube.

  • Required number of cells/total cells = volume required (ml).

components.data: Prepare 20ml 1X Binding Buffer by adding 1ml 20X Binding Buffer Stock to 19ml Nuclease Free Water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare 20ml 1X Binding Buffer by adding 1ml 20X Binding Buffer Stock to 19ml Nuclease Free Water.

components.data: Centrifuge cell suspension for 5min at 300g.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge cell suspension for 5min at 300g.

components.data: Remove supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove supernatant.

components.data: Resuspend cell pellet in 100ul Dead Cell Removal MicroBeads per 107 cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend cell pellet in 100ul Dead Cell Removal MicroBeads per 107 cells.

components.data: Mix well and incubate for 15mins at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix well and incubate for 15mins at room temperature.

components.data: When 5min of incubation remains, place MS column (if <2x108 cells) or an LS column (if <2x109 cells) on QuadroMACS Magnetic Cell Separator and run 500µl (MS column) or 3ml (LS column) 1X Binding Buffer through the LS column, using a waste 15ml Falcon Tube to catch the effluent.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When 5min of incubation remains, place MS column (if <2x108 cells) or an LS column (if <2x109 cells) on QuadroMACS Magnetic Cell Separator and run 500µl (MS column) or 3ml (LS column) 1X Binding Buffer through the LS column, using a waste 15ml Falcon Tube to catch the effluent.

components.data: When incubation is finished, add 1ml (MS column) or 3ml (LS column) 1X Binding Buffer to cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When incubation is finished, add 1ml (MS column) or 3ml (LS column) 1X Binding Buffer to cells.

components.data: Run cell suspension through LS column on QuadroMACS Magnetic Cell Separator, using a 15ml Falcon Tube to catch effluent as the the live cell fraction.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run cell suspension through LS column on QuadroMACS Magnetic Cell Separator, using a 15ml Falcon Tube to catch effluent as the the live cell fraction.

components.data: When cells have passed through, run 4 x 500µl (MS column) or 4 x 3ml (LS column) 1X Binding Buffer through LS column on QuadroMACS Magnetic Cell Separator using the same falcon tube to catch effluent as the the live cell fraction.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When cells have passed through, run 4 x 500µl (MS column) or 4 x 3ml (LS column) 1X Binding Buffer through LS column on QuadroMACS Magnetic Cell Separator using the same falcon tube to catch effluent as the the live cell fraction.

components.data: Centrifuge cells at 500g for 5 min at 4°C.  Resuspend in 0.5-1ml PBS + 0.04% BSA.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge cells at 500g for 5 min at 4°C.  Resuspend in 0.5-1ml PBS + 0.04% BSA.

components.data: Count cells and viability using nucleocounter.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Count cells and viability using nucleocounter.

components.data: Resuspend in appropriate volume of 0.04% BSA in PBS to run in Chromium.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend in appropriate volume of 0.04% BSA in PBS to run in Chromium.

components.data: Dilute cells to 2x106 cell per ml in 0.04% BSA and proceed to 10X preparation for scRNA sequencing.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute cells to 2x106 cell per ml in 0.04% BSA and proceed to 10X preparation for scRNA sequencing.

components.data: Ensure all unused tissue, equipment and tubes that have been in contact with primary tissue are placed into Virkon in sweetie jar for a minimum of 1 hour. After this time aspirate and disposing in relevant sharps or waste routes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Ensure all unused tissue, equipment and tubes that have been in contact with primary tissue are placed into Virkon in sweetie jar for a minimum of 1 hour. After this time aspirate and disposing in relevant sharps or waste routes.

components.data: Perform Freezing Human Tissue in Isopentane before beginning Dissociation Protocol
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Perform Freezing Human Tissue in Isopentane before beginning Dissociation Protocol
